note: (FR) If eligible, we will share your membership information with Sun Life Assurance Company of Canada (Sun Life), who will be responsible for handling member enrolment and administering claims processing and benefits for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
preferred-method: (FR) What is your preferred method of communication for both Sun Life and the Government of Canada?
preferred-language: (FR) What is your preferred official language of communication?
